title: All Support players are inters - prove me wrong, but show your work!

replies.body: I like how you drop the 0/9 Yasuo, because you know once he hits the 0/10 power spike its GG.

{{champion:238}} The unseen powerpike is the deadliest.

{{champion:157}} 0/10

{{champion:238}} Omae WA MO Shin deiru

{{champion:157}} 0/10 59:59 {{item:3031}} {{item:3046}} {{item:3072}} {{item:3036}} {{item:3006}} {{item:3026}}

{{champion:238}} **HahaHaaHaa**

{{champion:516}} Not so Fast! 
{{champion:516}} **59:59 - 60!!!!!**

**BEEEP-BEEEP-BEEEP-BEEEP!!!!!! **

{{champion:157}} {{item:3371}}

{{champion:238}} NANI!!!!

{{champion:157}} SOYRE GE TON!!!

{{champion:157}} {{champion:516}} ~~Yosh, Ramen~~
Jokes aside, I've seen the power of hitting 0/10 as yas. He suddenly comes out of fucking nowhere and shreds the entire backline in every fight, but never gets the kill :(

oh you mean my strategically minded (*cough*it's-called-inting-Riot-and-should-be-bannable*cough*) Yasuo didn't work that well? Darn
lol!

Always nice to get love as a support player especially when the adc gets their lane spoon fed for them or you turn things around. Even if the adc is not the carry for the game (happened my last  game, the Darius ended up carrying us), it was fun to support a melee champ after laning phase lol

Ever seen a Hail of Blades Bard?

They will get their carry fed, sure. They simply disagree about who the carry is.

AP Sona would like a word with you. 

And Brand.
And Velkoz.
Really any AP scaling champ in the support role.

>

But the real question is.
Can you spot the Vel'koz support in his natural habitat? (With David Attenborough's voice.)

"support" by the way. support brand support lux my ass {{sticker:sg-syndra}} {{sticker:sg-lulu}} {{sticker:slayer-jinx-unamused}}
i'll have you know I went 5/1/23 as lux support and scored extremely high on vision :P
right just mages with tons of damage and super long cc. not as long as morg but still long and up often.

I love the players that are like

0/9/6

"Bro u died 9 times"
"BUT IM A SUPPORT HAHAHA".

PS i only saw that in silver

-.33 KDR.. not great, but not awful. Same as a 0/3/2. Also, someone dying that many times is gonna be just about worthless from a feeding gold standpoint. 6 assists tells me they're actually *doing stuff to help their team*, but they probably need to position better.
Feed my carry? ADCs are just tyler 1 wanna bes, on the verge of inting at all points in the game. The support is the real carry, and as such all kills are mine.

> [{quoted}](name=Pika Fox,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=EAq9lWtN,comment-id=000e,timestamp=2018-10-17T19:37:38.985+0000)
>
> Feed my carry? ADCs are just tyler 1 wanna bes, on the verge of inting at all points in the game. The support is the real carry, and as such all kills are mine.

What you describe there is trolling. You are my enemy now.
Careful, that 0/10 powerspike on Yasuo is nothing to scoff at
Which is why I honor my support most of the time
Not Karma/Lux/etc. """support""" players. They steal all the kills and build full ap. Then as soon as they can 1shot caster minions, they start fuckin doing it
those aren't supports those are salty solo laners/junglers who were filled into the role a real support in those roles wouldn't do that shit lol
{{champion:555}} Says Hi lol, the only support that gets a carry number of kills {{sticker:slayer-jinx-catface}}
lol I mean more {{champion:555}} is the only Supp to get a carry level of kills yet not get yelled at for it
Not my fault that Riot continues to straight buff {{champion:89}} , W+Aftershock KSING still problematic.

I had a game recently of Pyke, I was useless but engaged constantly, meaning the enemy team would waste their ults on me as I went in, then my team cleaned up.

I'm like a pro.

Today i played support amumu. i did the most damage in the entire game, 42k. won the game, carried my adc. trashed the enemy team, made plays, one shot there adc and jungle oh and did i mention, as ap support amumu, with average of 2 cs a min, i had 14k more damage then the 2nd highest damage in the game ( Kassadin). tragic. amumu support is sleeper OP.
{{champion:555}}
No and No
{{champion:43}} {{item:3285}}
I'm pretty sure most 'supports' you've had are just autofilled out of position players who get bored when they are not the one getting the kills
It’s called kill secured. Assist gold is better then no gold.

For real though- I've had plenty of Support matches where I ended with a better KDA than the actual carries.

'Intentionally' :)

I do wonder why so few respect the Ashe support though:
You slow with every AA and damaging ability
You can provide vision anywhere on the map
Respectable poke in lane phase
And the ult remains one of the best CC abilities the game has to offer

>not taking kills or farm

Oh boy....I can without a doubt confirm that over 75% of supports do not follow this.....or they simply don't know what shoving is, like bitch help me shove the lane when I'm ADC and I wanna back :)

Still, good supports win games.

> [{quoted}](name=ShunposCastTime,realm=OCE,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=EAq9lWtN,comment-id=0003,timestamp=2018-10-17T17:37:33.090+0000)
>
> Oh boy....I can without a doubt confirm that over 75% of supports do not follow this.....or they simply don't know what shoving is, like bitch help me shove the lane when I'm ADC and I wanna back :)
> 
> Still, good supports win games.

It helps when you state your desires ahead of time. I've had ADCs that lose their shit if I last hit shit under tower (hint: saving the tower is more important than your 2 CS), I've had ADCs that ping ? and ask what I'm doing when I don't help bring their minions down faster.

People need to use words and ask for what they want...

Yeah, for sure, I just mean that support players a lot of the time are pretty braindead...no offence. Just like how other roles learn about how to play their role so should support players, and I think that so many support players just do not actively improve themselves. 

People do need to use words and pings, however a lot of the time you cannot type while in game because you are making split-second decisions, and pinging can be misinterpreted since people take pings differently as individuals. 

I'm just stating that a lot of supports (usually below Diamond) do not know how some concepts work as they play the same way every single game. I have nothing against supports really, if they're good they're usually friendly and they win the game for you, I'm just saying that I think that one of points is false in this post.

> [{quoted}](name=ShunposCastTime,realm=OCE,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=EAq9lWtN,comment-id=000300000000,timestamp=2018-10-17T22:11:07.226+0000)
>
> Yeah, for sure, I just mean that support players a lot of the time are pretty braindead...no offence. Just like how other roles learn about how to play their role so should support players, and I think that so many support players just do not actively improve themselves. 

None taken :)
 
> People do need to use words and pings, however a lot of the time you cannot type while in game because you are making split-second decisions, and pinging can be misinterpreted since people take pings differently as individuals. 

Pregame / immediately post spawn wouldn't be a bad place to get an answer for "How do you want me to handle your minions?" but either people don't listen/answer, or immediately mute all on game start because the toxicity is worse than the swamps of dagobah story from Reddit.

Dude, tell me about it, toxicity is at an all-time high this season. Funnily enough I usually find that supports are the last person to be toxic are your team, so communication with them is actually possible.
Supports can literally carry an entire game. It's one of the most important roles if you play it correctly... if my ADC is bad I literally will rush mobi's, run mid and gank as much as possible.
Just pick brand. That is all you need. He can Top/Jungle/Mid/ADC/Support. You can build him AD crit brand and he will still do 50k magic damage to you.
My 12/3/19 Leona support game begs to differ. ;)
I don't get supports generally. I just get a person in my lane I have to protect so they can get experience to level up. So I just end up picking support now.
Thank your team for carrying you

When you say "show your work". To disprove your statement, we need one counterexample.

Also, I'm not sure which part of what you said makes them inters.

(It's a joke)

Intentionally feeding ally ADC!
